title: "We're not using these robots to hand out flowers"
body: Wired has a neat little article on <a href="http://www.wired.com/news/technology/0,1282,63036,00.html">combat robots</a>.  Pretty sweet that technology will save the lives of at least our own soldiers, but I think I'd rather see more non-lethal solutions.
